text: Nino Khurtsidze (28 September 1975 â€“ 22 April 2018) was a Georgian chess player. She was born in the Soviet Union. She held the FIDE titles of International Master (IM) and Woman Grandmaster (WGM). She won the World Junior Girls Chess Championship in 1993 and 1995. In 2004, she came second behind Evgeny Shaposhnikov in the Essen Open tournament. Khurtsidze died of cancer in Tbilisi on 22 April 2018 at the age of 42. ==References== ==Other websites== *Nino Khurtsidze chess games at 365Chess.com Category:1975 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (country) Category:Chess players
title: Nino Khurtsidze
